input_text:
Job Title: Corporate Accountant - Large and Successful Omaha Company - HEMPHILL EXCLUSIVE!

Location: Omaha, NE

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Analyst, Finance

Description:
Corporate Accountant - Large and Successful Omaha Company - HEMPHILL EXCLUSIVE!
Hemphill is partnering with a long time client who has created and maintained a strong reputation throughout Omaha for many years. Due to continued growth and recent promotions, this company is ready hire a Corporate Accountant to join their team! This company sets the bar for profitability, employee engagement, development opportunities including “Young Professionals Groups”, and a thorough training program and career management plan.
This is an ideal role for an individual who would appreciate having their boss double as their mentor and someone who is eager to roll up their sleeves and master the basics. The office dynamic in this company is very different than others we’ve seen. The leadership team has done a good job of creating an environment where coworkers are free to collaborate and ask questions, individuals are challenged to do their best work, and everyone is encouraged to build relationships in an office that is full of energy.
This position will give you the experience and tools you need to lay a firm foundation in financial accounting which will be the platform your career is built from.
Partner closely with Senior Corporate Accountants and Managers as you jump right into the month-end close process. You will appreciate working with a leadership team who encourages you to think critically while also taking time to offer guidance and answer your questions.Enjoy a mix of structured daily responsibilities such as account reconciliations and recording journal entries while also being involved in special projects such as annual budgeting and forecasting or post-close analysis that will offer you variety and the opportunity to develop subject matter expertise.
Hemphill has placed many individuals into this organization who have thrived over the years. This company offers a newly remodeled office, a great benefits program, tuition reimbursement, warm company culture, and a department where you will have room to grow for years to come. To learn more about this position call Austin Hemphill at 402.334.4800 *246 or send an e-mail to ahemphill@hemphillsearch.com to learn more. Job # 9269AH
The Right Match - The First Time
Your Confidentiality is Our Priority; Hemphill will NOT Forward Your Resume Without Your Approval.
To see all Hemphill job postings go to www.hemphillsearch.com
Hemphill Voted – “Best Employment Firm” by Omaha’s Business Leaders & B2B Magazine in 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022 & 2023!
Omaha Chamber of Commerce Top 25 – “Excellence in Business Award Winner” based upon our growth and commitment to quality.
*** Never a fee to our applicants ***

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: Corporate Accountant
output_json.summary: Corporate Accountant position at a large and successful Omaha company.

Jumps right into the month-end close process
Works on account reconciliations and recording journal entries
Involved in special projects such as annual budgeting and forecasting
